title: Wotaku ni Koi wa Muzukashii Comic Anthology
description:
Minekura Kazuya (Saiyuki), Azusa Kina (After School at the Coffee Shop), Namori (YuruYuri), etc... A splendid writing team participates!
The official comic anthology of the popular manga Wotakoi: Love Is Hard for Otaku, which has sold a total of over 9 million copies (including digital editions)!

Contributors:
Cover: Fujita
Illustrations: Akiyoshi Shima, Sachiko, Namori, Haida Nanako
Manga:

1: Azusa Kina
2: Konno Paru
3: Hachiya Kujira
4: Shiromanta
5: Yamaguchi Eito
6: Dorokawa Megumi
7: Kakitsubata Waka
8: Nagao Uka
9: Anno
10: Tachi Aoi
11: Medamayaki
12: Nouichi Nye
13: Minami Kiri
14: Megane
15: Asahi Noboru
16: Minekura Kazuya
author: Various

2.title: Koyanagi Hanako is Acting Strange (by Konno Paru)

4.title: I Want You to Care About Me (by Shiromanta)

5.title: If It Were Me (by Yamaguchi Eito)
